channel.title: Castle Wars
channel.description:
Posting for: Delta
Been working on this 2 days ago :)
Currently: Bug fixing
A video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j6dDVIz5t58
This Castle Wars includes:
Working waiting room [IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/5204/cw1v.jpg[/img]
Working base room with Castle Wars interface [IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/9295/cw2w.jpg[/img]
Working barricades [IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/5265/cw3.jpg[/img]
Working catapult [IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/146/cw4.jpg[/img]
Working stepping stones [IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/1664/cw5.jpg[/img]
Mining rocks underground [IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/5783/cw6x.jpg[/img]
If you stand in the rocks and it explodes, you die [IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/5458/cw7.jpg[/img]
Winning interface [IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4751/cw8.jpg[/img]
Can only retrieve flag if enough space in your inventory [IMG]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/8640/cw9.jpg[/img]
Flag will spawn if you take it off or die [IMG]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/7109/cw10.jpg[/img]

item.title: Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:36, topic:268910”][quote author=vic 08 link=topic=354819.msg2722700#msg2722700 date=1238101861]

You’re showing off CW’s but you can’t show bandages? I mean I was wondering why there’s sharks there and not bandages if the bandages work…

Are you serious? Bandages aren’t that hard to code. If you knew how to code you could figure that out. I am on the beta right now, everything is working that he explained.

Are you serious? If I knew how to code? I merely asked him why he didn’t show bandages for a CWs preview? Don’t you ever open you’re eyes?

Im pointing out that IT IS EASY TO CODE. Would you like a picture just so you can feel better?

No I’m pretty sure you said I couldn’t program… And what proof do you have behind that? I pointed out there were no bandages get over yourself…

You are truley an idiot. If you really wish to “see the working bandages” then go on deltascape and look yourself.

I would never get on that piece of shit crap server… Just because its popular to kids, doesn’t mean it’s a good server. You blew this whole thing out of proportion defending you’re buddy delta… I’m done talking about this…

Yet, deltascape sources are the most commonly used servers now. I guess it’s not a good server since everyone uses it. You’re so retarded…
[/quote]

It’s the most commonly used server because of how everything is already done for them, they don’t have to put any effort into it at all whatsoever.[/quote]

^^ Exactly its easy, to edit because most of the stuff is already there. But stability wise it sucks, most the weapon timers are completely off, terrible use of OOP, has tons of bugs… I’m sick of seeing delta everywhere, because its making people become lazy when it comes to programming. As for the original owner of delta… He’s a dick, and doesn’t give a shit about anyone else except himself… And people can think hes oh so nice for releasing delta, but we know he got hacked and someone stole the source.

Read full topic
